definition[1]: to hang clothes outside in order to dry them
example[2]: My job was to hang out the washing.
example[3]: Hang the wet things out to dry.
definition[2]: to relax and do what you like
definition[3]: to not give someone support in a difficult situation, for example to let someone else get all the blame for something
